message: Let's be fair, I get a little more
Let's be real, Alice. I rejected your offer, so you know I'm not accepting less than half.  This is a good deal before inflation eats into it further.
You had your chance, now it's my turn again. Inflation is on my side
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time. We both know this needs to end eventually. 50/50 is the only fair outcome here.
You're running out of time, Bob. Inflation is eating away at your share. Take this before it's too late
